messages.content: I want to speak for the people who have had their interests eroded over the last decade. They include students with tuition fees, employees with little or no wage increases and pensioners who have seen their benefits curbed. UKIP and I will redirect development to protect our beautiful countryside and coast, both are vital to our tourist industry. UKIP and I will lobby for our small farmers and recover our fishing rights. A vote for UKIP and me gives local concerns a national voice.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour an extra £3 billion a year into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend in the UK.

issues.brexitEurope: By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend in the UK.

images.caption: Justin Haque in Totnes - Standing Up for Real Change
